alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Randolph; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 3:01PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Randolph, east central Tallapoosa and northern Chambers Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 301 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bowdon to near West Chambers. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Roanoke, Wedowee, Lafayette, Stroud, La Fayette, Wadley, Woodland, Lakeview, Five Points, Post Oak Forks, Denson, Amity Park, Abanda, Standing Rock, Welch, Trammel Crossroads, Ridge Grove, Buffalo, Fredonia and Veasey Creek Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for east central Alabama.
